scripts.test: npm run lint:ts && npx playwright test
scripts.test:ui: npm run lint:ts && npx playwright test --ui
scripts.test:headed: npm run lint:ts && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:debug: npm run lint:ts && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.test:report: npm run lint:ts && npx playwright show-report
scripts.test:update: npm run lint:ts && npx playwright test --update-snapshots
scripts.docker:test: docker compose run --rm playwright npm run test
scripts.docker:update: docker compose run --rm playwright npm run test:update
